thread.title: UK spreading propaganda over spy poisoning, Lavrov says

title: UK spreading propaganda over spy poisoning, Lavrov says
text:
UK spreading propaganda over spy poisoning, Lavrov says Friday, March 09, 2018 - 00:46 
Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov says Britain's warnings of retaliation over the spy poisoning incident were propaganda and that Russia can't be blamed for everything on the planet. Rough cut (no reporter narration)   
Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov says Britain's warnings of retaliation over the spy poisoning incident were propaganda and that Russia can't be blamed for everything on the planet. Rough cut (no reporter narration)  //reut.rs/2IhsQaw
